lesson_html:
• Hello! - A common way to greet someone.
  • How are you? - A friendly way to ask about someone's well-being.
  • Good morning/afternoon/evening! - Time-specific greetings to use throughout the day.
  • Nice to meet you! - A polite phrase when meeting someone for the first time.
  • Goodbye! - A way to say farewell when parting ways.

items.explanation_en: A formal way to ask someone about their well-being.
A common question to inquire about the current time.
A friendly way to ask someone about their day.

items.en: do you have any plans for tonight?
items.explanation_en: A casual question about someone's evening schedule.
A question to learn about someone's interests.
A way to ask someone about their day after it has ended.
A caring question about someone's well-being.

items.en: what did you do last weekend?
items.target: ¿qué hiciste el fin de semana pasado?
items.explanation_en: A question to inquire about someone's past weekend.

items.en: will you join us for lunch?
items.target: ¿te unirás a nosotros para el almuerzo?
items.explanation_en: An invitation to share a meal together.

items.en: do you want to go for a walk?
items.explanation_en: A friendly suggestion to spend time outdoors.
